name: Space Jump - Endless Trip <3 on GOOGLE PLAY!
name_original: Space Jump - Endless Trip <3 on GOOGLE PLAY!
description:
Space Jump gives you an enjoyable space trip to explore new planets!
This is deliciously replayable! Enjoy this funny action in space!

How high can you jump into space? 

Journey up from one platform to the next, pick up coins to upgrade your character and avoid the blades.

Jump or fly into space to unlock special items and try to find another lost planets!

In this endless trip game you could explore space by using our special items (kangaroo shoes, 2 types of boost and other surprises available on UPGRADES MENU). It helps you to fly and jump faster,higher or to became immune for blades/monsters and you will have a better chance to obtain a higher score in your space endless trip ! 

Every jump on space will became more addictive and brings you a lot of objectives to accomplish and make this game more attractive! Your trip will be so funny when you fly between stars!

How to play:
Tilt to move left or right, tap the screen to shoot.

This game is insanely addictive & fun! 

MAG STUDIO loves you <3 !
